pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, July 21, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, July 21, 2017:

Shelburne, Nova Scotia

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit with children at the Out and About Day Camp to highlight the Canada Child Benefit. A media availability will follow.

Out and About Day Camp
The Islands Provincial Park
Shelburne, Nova Scotia

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity and open coverage for media availability
  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.

Port Joli, Nova Scotia

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Kejimkujik Seaside National and Historic Park.

Kejimkujik Seaside
Kejimkujik National Park
Port Joli, Nova Scotia

Notes for media :

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:45 p.m.
